item.title: My Blog Pipeline
item.description:
Obsidian

The Setup

- create a new folder labeled posts. This is where I will add my blog posts.
- created posts folder in content folder of blogsite locally
- mirrored obsidian posts folder to blogsite posts folder

Setting Up Hugo

  • Install Hugo

Prerequisites:

  • **Install Git: ** -![[Pasted image 20241206061702.png]] Git was already installed so I checked for updates: ![[Pasted image 20241206062019.png]]

  • Install Go: https://go.dev/dl/ -![[Pasted image 20241206062744.png]]

Install Hugo Link: https://gohugo.io/installation/
